child.pri-name: Literary Mongolian and the later East Mongolian languages
child.pub-comments: Eastern Mongolian, contains Mongolian Proper which might be what Menges/Sauvageot refered to as Literary Mongolian, also contains the three languages below, they are only examples of more languages, which Menges/Sauvageot don't name
